xml:
Propess<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Cervical ripening and induction of labour at term

By vagina

  • Adult (female)

    1 pessary, insert pessary (in retrieval device) high into posterior fornix and remove when cervical ripening adequate; if oxytocin necessary, remove 30 minutes before oxytocin infusion; remove if cervical ripening inadequate after 24 hours (dose not to be repeated).

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
